Transform your academic workflow with Pandoc — a powerful, free, and open-source document converter that handles Word, LaTeX, PDF, Markdown, HTML, EPUB, and more. Perfect for researchers and students who need seamless format conversion with citation support.

---

## Essential Pandoc Commands

### Word to PDF Conversion

```bash
pandoc myfile.docx -o myfile.pdf --pdf-engine=xelatex
```

### Markdown to Word

```bash
pandoc myfile.md -o myfile.docx
```

### LaTeX to Word

```bash
pandoc myfile.tex -o myfile.docx
```

### Word to LaTeX

```bash
pandoc myfile.docx -o myfile.tex
```

### Markdown to PDF

```bash
pandoc myfile.md -o myfile.pdf --pdf-engine=xelatex
```

### HTML to Word

```bash
pandoc myfile.html -o myfile.docx
```

### Word to HTML

```bash
pandoc myfile.docx -o myfile.html
```

### With Bibliography (Citations)

```bash
pandoc myfile.md -o myfile.pdf --bibliography=refs.bib --csl=apa.csl
```

### Multiple Input Files

```bash
pandoc chapter1.md chapter2.md chapter3.md -o thesis.pdf
```

### Extract Text from PDF

```bash
pandoc myfile.pdf -o myfile.txt
```

## Quick Reference Table

| Conversion | Command |
|------------|---------|
| Word → PDF | `pandoc file.docx -o file.pdf --pdf-engine=xelatex` |
| Word → LaTeX | `pandoc file.docx -o file.tex` |
| LaTeX → Word | `pandoc file.tex -o file.docx` |
| Markdown → Word | `pandoc file.md -o file.docx` |
| Markdown → PDF | `pandoc file.md -o file.pdf --pdf-engine=xelatex` |
| HTML → Word | `pandoc file.html -o file.docx` |
| Word → HTML | `pandoc file.docx -o file.html` |

## Illustration and Figure Preparation Tools

### Microsoft PowerPoint

Good for simple vector illustrations and quick academic diagrams with built-in templates and smart graphics.

### Microsoft Visio

Professional tool for flowcharts, system diagrams, and complex technical illustrations with extensive shape libraries.

### Figma

Collaborative interface design tool perfect for creating modern, professional academic figures and presentations.

[Visit Figma](https://www.figma.com){target="_blank"}

### Lucidchart

Web-based diagramming platform with templates for research workflows, process diagrams, and organizational charts.

[Visit Lucidchart](https://www.lucidchart.com){target="_blank"}

### Draw.io (diagrams.net)

Free, open-source tool for flowcharts, network diagrams, and structured illustrations with cloud storage integration.

[Visit Draw.io](https://www.drawio.com){target="_blank"}

### GIMP

Powerful open-source image editor similar to Photoshop, ideal for photo manipulation and raster graphics editing.

[Visit GIMP](https://www.gimp.org){target="_blank"}

## Advanced Pandoc Options

### Custom PDF Styling

```bash
pandoc myfile.md -o myfile.pdf --pdf-engine=xelatex --template=custom.tex
```

### Table of Contents

```bash
pandoc myfile.md -o myfile.pdf --toc --toc-depth=3
```

### Numbered Sections

```bash
pandoc myfile.md -o myfile.pdf --number-sections
```

### Extract Media from Word

```bash
pandoc myfile.docx --extract-media=./media -o myfile.md
```

### Standalone HTML

```bash
pandoc myfile.md -o myfile.html --standalone --self-contained
```

::: {.callout-note}
## Pro Tip
Combine multiple options for complex conversions:

```bash
pandoc myfile.md -o myfile.pdf \
  --pdf-engine=xelatex \
  --bibliography=refs.bib \
  --csl=ieee.csl \
  --toc \
  --number-sections
```
:::
